artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada III; Carver: Katada Chōjirō
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: triptych: temple building at center, at end of street lined with a two-story building on L side, and little shops on R; people walking down street, visiting temple, and in shops and tea house at L; mounted together on thick paper
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: View of the Grounds of the Konpira Shrine on Mount Kurakake in Kashiwagura, Yashū
